document_data.caption: A map of Chondath showing Shamph
document_data.name: Shamph
document_data.mainbody: '''Shamph''', also known as the '''Crossroads City''', was a city in the nation of [[Chondath]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]]. Merchants from the south stopped at Shamph to sell their goods to avoid the war zone between the cities of [[Iljak]] and [[Hlath]].
document_data.Government: The city was ruled fairly and justly by mayor [[Tian Redown]].
document_data.Geography: Shamph sat at the junction of the [[Emerald Way]] and the [[Old Road (Vilhon Reach)|Old Road]].{{stub}}
document_data.History: Shamph was destroyed during the [[Spellplague]].<ref name = "FRPG-p126">{{Template:Cite book/Forgotten Realms Player's Guide|126}}
